## buildStaticTree() function

Build helper that uses [ExtendedTNodeBuilder](./static-tree.extendedtnodebuilder.md) internally.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function buildStaticTree<ChildrenRecord extends Record<string, ExtendedTNode>, Data extends TNodeData>(build: (builder: ExtendedTNodeBuilder) => ExtendedTNodeBuilder<ChildrenRecord, Data>, key?: string): ExtendedTNode<ChildrenRecord, Data>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  build | (builder: [ExtendedTNodeBuilder](./static-tree.extendedtnodebuilder.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [ExtendedTNodeBuilder](./static-tree.extendedtnodebuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;ChildrenRecord, Data&gt; | build instruction |
|  key | string | <i>(Optional)</i> key for the [ExtendedTNode](./static-tree.extendedtnode.md) to be built |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ExtendedTNode](./static-tree.extendedtnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;ChildrenRecord, Data&gt;
